column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////When we entered the jam-packed restaurant on North State Street a little after 9pm on a Friday night
column2: put our name on a list for a table and pre-ordered our pizza at the counter. After a short wait
column3: we were guided to a seat and a few minutes later our delicious half cheese
column4: half pepperoni deep-dish pizza arrived. It was SO FREAKING GOOD. So good in fact
column5: that we had the left-overs for breakfast the next day!
